metadata.title: CVE-2018-16375 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenJPEG 2.3.0. Missing checks forheader_info.height and header_info.width in the function pnmtoimage inbin/jpwl/convert.c can lead to a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
